⊢ (((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0))∧(c2 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c2))→(c2 = c1 ∨ c2 = c3))

comment: A maximal ideal is a maximal proper ideal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 16-Jun-2011.)
